text:
Uncle is very friendly, the Mee Soto is really good.. chili is spicy so ask for less chili if your not someone who can tahan spicy food.

The Epok Epok is the best! But only available early in the morning, by 11am expect it to be sold out.

Recommend to be there at 830-9am to get your hands on the Epok Epok
Had the beef rendang and fried (scrambled) egg with rice. Beef was good but could be more tender. Chilli was great too.
The uncle is very friendly. I ordered mee Soto for lunch. The S oup is very taste and reasonable portion. Only comment is that the shredded chicken could be more tender.

Everything on the menu is yummylicious....value for money too.
I will order a different dish for breakfast daily...and something not to be miss is the curry puff...
